data.title: Glad Tidings Products
data.meta_description: Glad Tidings Products | 59 followers on LinkedIn. Glad Tidings Products LLC was formed to develop and commercialize innovative products around traditional holidays | Glad Tidings Products LLC was formed to develop and commercialize innovative products around traditional holidays such as Christmas. Our first product is HoHoHoH2o EZ Christmas Tree Watering System. HoHoHoH2o automatically waters your Christmas tree and is disguised as a beautifully wrapped Christmas gift.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
